column5: Enjoy all Uptown has to offer in the historic State Thomas neighborhood, steps away from nightlife, restaurants and parks. Hop on the free M-Line Trolley and explore downtown Dallas' museums and arts district. Or, stay in and enjoy a drink on the 4th floor balcony with gorgeous sunset views. Enjoy designer decor under 15-foot vaulted ceilings, his-and-hers sinks in the expansive master bathroom, a queen size bed and spacious living/dining area with newly upgraded kitchen.
